mapper.select: select id, order_id, phone, uid, pay_amount, electricity_cabinet_id, old_electricity_battery_sn, new_electricity_battery_sn, old_cell_no, new_cell_no, status, payment_method, source, remark, switch_begin_time, switch_end_time, create_time, update_time from electricity.t_electricity_cabinet_order where id = #{id}

mapper.update:
